title: With complete automation of record-keeping from storage to retrieval, inventory management becomes centralized.
text-1: You can place items in available spaces without being bound by specific placement rules, as the camera diligently records their locations.
text-2: This system allows workers to focus solely on picking tasks, relieving them from the burden of other inventory management responsibilities. Even staff members who are unfamiliar with the site can efficiently carry out inventory management tasks, ensuring smooth operations.
